lead_paragraph: A bill signed into law Thursday by Gov. Sam Brownback tells poor families that they cannot use cash assistance from the state for concerts, tattoos, psychics or lingerie.

headline.print_headline: Kansas: State Sets Limits on Use of Cash Assistance for Poor
headline.main: Kansas: State Sets Limits on Use of Cash Assistance for Poor

snippet: A bill signed into law Thursday by Gov. Sam Brownback tells poor families that they cannot use cash assistance from the state for concerts, tattoos, psychics or lingerie.
abstract: Kansas Gov Sam Brownback signs bill into law that limits ATM withdrawals of cash assistance from state to $25 a day and forbids families to use money for concerts, tattoos, psychics or lingerie.
